attributes.action: Follow the Covid vaccine manufacturers guidance. Give the 2nd jab at 21 days.
attributes.additional_details: To stop the risk of further deaths. Instructions are there for a reason as they keep telling us about washing hands & staying at home.
attributes.background: Let the NHS Vaccinators administer the Covid vaccine as per the manufacturers instructions by giving the second injection after 21 days.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban vaccines being administered in a manner not fully tested in clinical trials
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566116
